website_summaries.verdict: The market leader offers terrific power and great control.
pros: 110 BAR and 360 liters/hour are competitive numbers, and the pressure control on the lance is excellent
Quick connect fittings make for fast lance changes
cons: Not much, but there are occasional reports of leaks and motor failures

customer_reviews.title: Buy it new
customer_reviews.text: Pressure washer arrived on the correct date 15/7/2019 sent back the day after 16/7/2019 parts missing! It had well and truly been used! (Dirty) thoroughly disappointing! A few scuffs here and there also and there were small fragments that had been broken off.
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish just pretty on the outside
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY! KARCHER are not what they once were, seemed fine on first use second time using the unit started to leak, research into leaking karchers online shows that its a common issue because of cheap imported parts now not made in germany.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rubish
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely rubbish used only once second time no power giving it one star because to submit a review I have to should be minus ten
customer_reviews.author: Melvyn Bamford

customer_reviews.title: Poorly built
customer_reviews.text: awful! Turned it on on the second day and it died within a second. Changed the fuse, but still no joy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Internal water leak after 14 months of occasional use
customer_reviews.text: Worked well enough for patio and car cleaning. Didn’t remove traffic film from the car even using Karcher detergent- good for cleaning alloy wheels. It’s an oversight that there’s no holder for the detergent bottle which means it falls over too often. The unit is now throwing water through the vents and can no longer be used. Of course the 12 month guarantee has just run out!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: At first this worked just as expected. However, after being used for only the second time, it stopped working after cleaning just a couple of square meters. After contacting Karcher it turns out this was a simple air pocket and after removing the high pressure hose and running water through it, it's fully working again and good value for money
customer_reviews.author: Mike Formby

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t bother it’s a child’s toy
customer_reviews.text: I am guessing that most people would have done their homework if they wanted a pressure washer ....unfortunately I didn’t this model is not really much better than a standard hose , sure it does clean the bike and facials and gutter but for everything else it’s rubbish . If you think you are going to clean a car or anything substantial don’t get it spend a bit more and get a bigger model . I am gutted I didn’t spend more and you will be too. My advice is save your money and get you car washed somewhere else . It’s not karchers fault though it’s mine for being impressed by the hard sell in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product!
customer_reviews.text: An Excellent power washer from Karcher, I've used more powerful ones but the K2 does everything I require around the home, from washing the car/mountain bike to cleaning the patio and preparing the garden wall for painting, The K2 is capable of these jobs and more. I'ts easy to put together and has two types of nozzles for different power settings (don't put your fingers over the ends because it hurts, a lot!), My concrete path hasn't been cleaned before and the difference the K2 made is fantastic, I almost forgot it was concrete underneath. An excellent product that I feel is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: K Clewley

customer_reviews.title: Smart and light to use
customer_reviews.text: My 10+ year old Karcher died this Friday, so I went online and ordered a K2. Delivered today Saturday and first thoughts are it is very light, so clearly there is less cast aluminium than in the old one, hopefully that won’t matter. The new one seems slightly less powerful but I am not sure that it actually is, it is just different, quieter, lighter and easier to handle and I think that is why it gives the impression of being less powerful. Let’s hope this one lasts for another 10+ years
customer_reviews.author: scrimple

customer_reviews.title: Marched pressure washer
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the pressure washer. This cleared up my paving slabs absolutely brilliantly! Very impressed! A*****
customer_reviews.author: Sue Fry

customer_reviews.title: It works well
customer_reviews.text: I've just used it for cleaning the patio after months of wintery tree grime. The Karcher is very light and easy to use. It has adjustable spray patterns for all kinds of jobs around the place. I used the most powerful setting for the patio it coped well with the job in hand. The picture is the before and after.
customer_reviews.author: mr s.c.rogers

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was really pleased when my new pressure washer arrived I was itching to clean the slabs in the back garden after the winter. Always had a Karcher and never been disappointed with the performance of it. However I was disappointed with this particular model due to how light the whole thing is causing it to constantly fall over as I moved around, it's light enough to hold but then what's the point of it having wheels! Agreeing with other buyers that the hose doesn't wrap around the unit neatly in the slightest! I don't know if this is for a specific purpose but shown in the pictures is where I am storing mine.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pressure washer to clean the car. You can buy the snow foam attachment in here to turn your car in to a big foam mess! At the rear of the pressure washer is the attachment to connect the hose pipe. If you unscrew the attachment, you will find the water filter. Clean this after each use or it will Cause a blockage/ low water pressure.
customer_reviews.author: MrTom

customer_reviews.title: Failed after a few uses
customer_reviews.text: Bought in April 2017 and used a couple of times to clean patio and paths with very good results. A year later and about to do the same thing, and it won't turn on. Expected it to last more than just a few uses.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Paul N Fowkes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent jet washer
customer_reviews.text: An Excellent power washer from Karcher, from washing the car/mountain bike to cleaning the patio and preparing the garden wall for painting, The K2 is capable of these jobs and more. It’s easy to put together and has two types of nozzles for different power settings (don't put your fingers over the ends because it hurts, a lot!), My concrete path hasn't been cleaned before and the difference the K2 made is fantastic, I almost forgot it was concrete underneath. An excellent product that I feel is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Zayyar Myint

customer_reviews.title: Suitable for most home uses.
customer_reviews.text: K2.Everything is a lot less engineered than old one this replaces after many years. Lances supplied do not give high press.jet. Good news old lance fits(not recommended for paintwork) as does cleaning solution device(car cleaning)which saves having to place tube into bottle. OK until you move unit as bottle will have to be moved as well. Only runs when trigger pulled. Easy to move or carry as quite light. Seems suitable for my use.Time will tell. Only 3 stars as using cleaning solution tube is a pain. Carried onboard on other units that cost more.
customer_reviews.author: Mr K M

customer_reviews.title: Amazed!
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about this pressure washer. It was a resonable price. Multiple settings for pressure for different uses. When you want to pressure wash brick, stone or wood it has a really high pressur option which quickly removes dirt. You can pull the clear tube from the rear and put it straight into a bottle of shampoo making it easy to switch between dofferent ones. Also easy connect hoses and attachments made putting it together then away was a breeze. Absolutely love this pressur washer and would recommend it for anyone
customer_reviews.author: Liam

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to replace a Karcher I’d had for many years, compared to the old one this is very lightweight and feels cheap. Works ok but the hose could be/needs to be longer to prevent dragging the thing every time you move direction, having said that it works well and does the job. I bought a hose extension to make using it less annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Alan. P

customer_reviews.title: It’s plastic
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike about the machines power, it is very light as it is mostly plastic, my old k3 karcher stopped woraking so bought the k2 to use while I try and fix it, all the tools that came with my 8 year old k3 fit the k2, on th k2 the hose pipe to the gun Looks and feels cheap plastic tubing Compared to my old one so I will be keeping those as spares, overall apart from them a nice pressure from it
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Quick fit pressure hose
customer_reviews.text: Having owned a Karcher jet wash before this new one has quick fit connectors for the hose which makes me wonder if this will hold up after some use, will it start leaking, I also found the hose length of 4m a little short so I purchased a 10m replacement as the body of the machine was getting filthy with spray dirt, performance appears just as good as my previous one but will it last?
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bull

customer_reviews.title: 3rd Karcher in about 8 years
customer_reviews.text: I like the Karcher and I gave the last one a lot of use. They do a good job and I have kept all the attachments from the old ones that interchange, I use it for boat, car and patio drive sets and stone cleaning. The last 2 have lasted about 4 years each so when you look at the cost its a lot use for a few quid a year. Just used for car washing they should last for ages.
customer_reviews.author: Garth

customer_reviews.title: Clean as...
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with my first pressure washer. Easy to set up, easy to use. Changing between foaming bottle and lances, a doddle. Cleaned 2 cars with minimal effort.
customer_reviews.author: Stewart Parnell

customer_reviews.title: Not very powerful
customer_reviews.text: This washer does remove some dirt but there is no power in it... if you have a bit of dried on mud that you want to remove then this will do the job but stains and anything remotely stuck then you are wasting your money. Quicker and more effective to get a tough brush and some soap and scrub as this really isn’t very good.
customer_reviews.author: Jade J

customer_reviews.title: Karcher pressure washer (recommended)
customer_reviews.text: Love this item. I already had one but it broke down mid-clean. Had I not been in the middle of a job I would have tried to order a new part and fix the one I have but I needed to complete the job. Was definitely different to the one I was using. Very powerful and it did an excellent job. I will be looking to dismantle the old one I have and try and fix it and will pass to my son if I do. Would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: S Hobbs

customer_reviews.title: Very portable and efficient.
customer_reviews.text: A light, fairly small device, which appears ideal for general pressure cleaning duties. It is powerful enough to strip paint which is not bonded well, so care is needed when using full pressure too close to the surface being cleaned. I find it very good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and compact, perfect little pressure washer
customer_reviews.text: Having moved house I needed a new pressure washer for car cleaning. This was a no brainer purchase and was on deal at the time. Easy to unbox and put together, nice and compact in size and provides a consistent pressure. It is quite loud compared to other models I’ve used in the past, but that doesn’t bother me, just my neighbours early on the weekends!
customer_reviews.author: Rio

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: A lovely small jet wash. Perfect for in the garden and to wash the car. The only reason I’ve given 1 less star is the length of the electrical cable. It’s a bit short for our outside plug so we have to use the extension lead. Other than that it’s well worth the money. :)
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Kärcher K2 Full Control Pressure Washer.
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant Pressure Washer. Highly recommended for patios, paving, cleaning the Car etc etc.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Walker

customer_reviews.title: Quite basic
customer_reviews.text: Pressure isn't that great. I had to turn up strength. And could get quite messy... I tried to clean a stubborn dirt and mould from flagstones but ended up having to repaint fence... perhaps I should have got Bosch was her instead
customer_reviews.author: Ms. F. leighton

customer_reviews.title: Leaking from black hose connections
customer_reviews.text: Leaking from the front black hose connection which links to the gun handle connection (also leaks at this connection) Not sure if I have put this together incorrectly or it’s really poorly made? Has anyone else had this problem?
customer_reviews.author: Tash Newton

customer_reviews.title: Bit surprised at the quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought one last week, it didn't work at all. Sent it back immediately, and got a replacement three days later, Thankyou Amazon. Don't know how long this one will last though, seems very flimsy and cheap compared to the old Karchers.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs S M Iles

customer_reviews.title: Design subtly changed to make your old accessories incompatible
customer_reviews.text: Karcher have changed the design of the heads so that they no longer fit into the old Karcher extensions....this was the key factor in choosing karcher again as I have a multitude of accessories...
customer_reviews.author: William Rattlepilum

customer_reviews.title: No refund after one week
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 3rd use.kept running on i had to switch off at mains.still waiting for refund a week later.easy to assemble.easy to use company not good.i wont buy from them again
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results within minutes!
customer_reviews.text: Thrilled with this new Karcher. Stunning transformation of our Indian sandstone paths and patios back to good as new results! My husband is delighted at the ease of use and instant results.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Caird

customer_reviews.title: Light but powerful.
customer_reviews.text: This was bought to replace my worn out K3 500 washer. It provides almost as much power but is much lighter & smaller, easily used by my wife who struggled with the previous one. Very good value. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product 👌, very powerful, cleans out moss and weeds from paving stones. Highly recommended this product 👌
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well
customer_reviews.text: First use want even on our drive - husband has to pressure wash his mums back yard and it all came up really well
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. A. C. Savory

customer_reviews.title: Not a sturdy machine  both handles loose
customer_reviews.text: I would have liked it to have arrived already assembled. the directions were not that clear gave up in the end , family put it together for me. It still seems a little flimsy not sturdy . A little disappointed with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected as the cheapest jet washer
customer_reviews.text: Just used this for the first time. Wow is all I can say. I got it to clear the moss and a bit of grime from my paving slab patio but I have now discovered that my patio is actually white underneath the dirt! Easy to assemble. It is quite noisy but then I guess I would be noisy being compressed at high pressure. Very impressed. Glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. D. Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Bet than the old one
customer_reviews.text: Previous karcher started to leak and the part cost £56 to replace purchase a new one for £70 the new one is better so it seems a no brainier can recommend
customer_reviews.author: david whittle

customer_reviews.title: not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: i used this 5 times on the sixth time it would not work
customer_reviews.author: Florence Rasmussen

customer_reviews.title: It’s yellow
customer_reviews.text: I knew it was the basic model but it seems to do what I need it to. Only gets 4 on assembly because I’m stupid and keep forgetting to depressurise the system before taking the hose off!!!
customer_reviews.author: D. I. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my cleaning needs. Luckily I had a spare hose i could connest between the washer and the water outlet. Does all the basic powerwashing you would need
customer_reviews.author: Urmas

customer_reviews.title: Highly pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: Highly pleased with it , it took 10 years of dirt and grime of our Patio, its as good as new. thankyou. PS Itis certainly worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Moverley

customer_reviews.title: Lighter good machine
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Karcher it is much lighter than previous one works a treat powerful enough for doing car have not tried it on the slabs yet.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Clark

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for a lady to use.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for a lady in West Cornwall......... arrived when expected, very quickly !! I put it together myself in two min's ...... I'm sure that she will have no problems using it. Many thanks....... J.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Great Pressure Washer but get soap attachment
customer_reviews.text: My lads asked for this to was their mountain bikes and now all cars are valeted too Can’t grumble Very effective
customer_reviews.author: Kimpy

customer_reviews.title: Trusted jetwash
customer_reviews.text: Love the flexibility of this, can change the power and hose type easily. I also like that it's lightweight and easy to carry around and store.
customer_reviews.author: luco123

customer_reviews.title: Faulty lance
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use around the garden works well but unfortunately one of the lances became faulty after one use for unknown reason
customer_reviews.author: James Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Good machine - not as powerful as expected!
customer_reviews.text: Good machine but not as powerful as expected but still did the job.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. M Velasquez

customer_reviews.title: No  worth  any  penny
customer_reviews.text: Used just two times and main switch was broken . Do not buy this cheap made machine
customer_reviews.author: guseva

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: After having cheap pressure washers for years this thing is amazing The adjustable power acne is brilliant
customer_reviews.author: Greg Skoorb

customer_reviews.title: Great value and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The Karcher K2 does what it says on the box. It is a multi-purpose high pressure washer that is easy to assemble and to use. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: John R. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Very good cleaned up our patio a treat and made a huge difference to our brick block drive. Couldn't be more pleased
customer_reviews.author: Adrian J. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Just right for the job
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jet wash for keepimg the trio and driveway clean. The pressure is enough for me and at this price is good value.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Fast and effective
customer_reviews.text: This washed performed perfectly on cleaning our stable yard, removing stains and debris from the paving in double quick time.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. S. Thorne

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Great for cleaning patio slabs and washing the car Update: Worked great with a minor leak during first use Second use main unit leaked alot of water
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: It worked for 10 minutes
customer_reviews.text: Poor, Worked for 10 minutes, cleaned four paving slabs and packed up. Sent it back to Karcher, they wanted to repair it. No way, it's brand new and only lasted 10 minutes, wanted my money back or a direct replacement. The replacement is on its way....
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Brillent finish the job nicely only problem is the gun could be abit longer
customer_reviews.text: Brillent finish the job nicely only problem is the gun could be abit longer, as I have to bend the back part from that excellent very happy⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️👍
customer_reviews.author: meg

customer_reviews.title: had new feature, ability to change the pressure without changing lance.
customer_reviews.text: Had Karchers before always good this no different except ability to change pressure without changing lance.
customer_reviews.author: robert frederick edwards

customer_reviews.title: brilliant piece of kit
customer_reviews.text: Tried and tested, brilliant piece of kit, highly recommended, great for washing our vehicles, brick walls and paved areas.
customer_reviews.author: Tis Crossy from Port Talbot

customer_reviews.title: excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. Definitely improved over the years. Find this one to be easily managed
customer_reviews.author: kamanu

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: My last jetwash which was by Vax and weighed a ton broke down very quickly. Ordered the karcher after reading many reviews and I am not disappointed, this little guy is so powerful and light weight. Love it, have talked my neighbour and sister into getting one too.
customer_reviews.author: M K

customer_reviews.title: Karcher gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: A very powerful pressure washer, easy to assemble easy to move around. Packs away nice and tidy.
customer_reviews.author: Graham Sampson

customer_reviews.title: Great all round
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for a few weeks now and used it a handful of times. For the price it is, quite cheap against other brands and similar devices, it gets great power and made light work of the patio in my garden. I would recommend buying a longer hose for the spray lance as the one that comes with it is quite short and means you need to keep moving the unit around.
customer_reviews.author: John Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to setup and easy to use. A great replacement for my last K2 that died suddenly.
customer_reviews.author: N. Wileman

customer_reviews.title: Good product easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The item came on time and is just as advertised works good and does what it says good product easy to use good value
customer_reviews.author: Stan the Man

customer_reviews.title: Out door cleaning made easy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and achieves what it is intended to do !!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Underwood

customer_reviews.title: Very light
customer_reviews.text: Hose too short but it’s so lightweight it does not create too much of a problem.
customer_reviews.author: emyr hughes

customer_reviews.title: sprayers delight
customer_reviews.text: what a pleasure despite negative reviews it worked did not go bang did not leak and effortless zapped my patio which i had not sprayed for over a year.large patio and took about 45 mins with constant use
customer_reviews.author: Nigel Buet

customer_reviews.title: Pressure power not great...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, but it has cut out a few times during use and its not that powerful, It just not remove moss from a driveway for example. I guess you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: alex nightingale

customer_reviews.title: What not to like
customer_reviews.text: Small, powerful and really good value for money. Enough for 30sq tiled garden
customer_reviews.author: Agne

customer_reviews.title: Terrible reliability
customer_reviews.text: In about 10 car washes, the unit started to leak oil and water.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Gonzalo Navarro

customer_reviews.title: I would never buy one again  a poor product
customer_reviews.text: The grade of pressure on each jet setting was not powerful enough for doing the item it says it was to do plus 8 filter for 4 for the soap sud bottle or shampoo to go through the machine did not work was not impressed with this machine for what it cost was never wasted my money
customer_reviews.author: Rick Lambourne

customer_reviews.title: Lovely stuff
customer_reviews.text: Never bothered before. But its brillant. I know nothing about P washers. Needed one for patio. Mrs joined which. After LOTS(!) Of comparing bought this. Patio looks like new. Wish bought 2 years ago
customer_reviews.author: nb

customer_reviews.title: Karcher K2
customer_reviews.text: Delivered well within time frame. Well packed. Nice Karcher Easy to assemble. Only tiny issue, the hose looks longer than the actual hose you receive. Apart from that very happy
customer_reviews.author: Andy Shoebridge

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This Is Excellent Washed The Paving And Slabs A Treat
customer_reviews.author: Ann Webb

customer_reviews.title: Cleans the patio
customer_reviews.text: Really good at removing the greenish algae from the slabs.
customer_reviews.author: Stu

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent brought my miss overgrown patio back to new recomend
customer_reviews.author: tony1977

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent - good price, quick delivery, shipped in perfect condition, has really good pressure. Brilliant for blasting driveways and brickwork.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: This is ok, not as sturdy as they used to be. Poorer quality. But cleans well
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Oakes

customer_reviews.title: Very good and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have had an early model but this is much better first class bit of kit A 1
customer_reviews.author: ken butler

customer_reviews.title: It feels plastricy and not buildt to last
customer_reviews.text: Only used once since arrival and tested. Was under powered compared with my old Bosch. Was not over impressed.
customer_reviews.author: swansea gareth

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My old one died right in the middle of me cleaning my decking. Ordered this and got it the next day. Great at not only cleaning the decking but the coloured stones as well
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Bell

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Normal Karcher unit does what it says on the tin.
customer_reviews.author: Marc b.

customer_reviews.title: best pressure washer
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use I bought the brush aswell which is great for cleaning cars
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Works very well.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time and is of excellent quality. Very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Ensor

customer_reviews.title: Great item good pressure bargain price
customer_reviews.text: Please with my new karcher pressure washer, really pee'd off I can't use my old pipe from my knackered karcher washer as they have changed the fittings
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Love this, cleared my decking in no time and it was effortless 😁
customer_reviews.author: Lawson Ralphs

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excelent little machine with multi function head. About time they put all the different spray heads in one.
customer_reviews.author: bobbyB

customer_reviews.title: Lesson in product maintenance
customer_reviews.text: Sent this product back nothing wrong with it , the old one started working after a clean the lime scale from the washer filter! DOH
customer_reviews.author: mikel

customer_reviews.title: You can have different spray outlet by turning the knob on the spray.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived the next day of ordering and we used it straight away perfect very powerful brilliant!!
customer_reviews.author: Sue Cousins

customer_reviews.title: Easy Peasy
customer_reviews.text: It will get better as one gets used to it but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: John Firrell

customer_reviews.title: Tiny but powerful!
customer_reviews.text: Tiny but powerful! Light weight, easy set up and storage! Excellent for cars and motorbikes alike.
customer_reviews.author: Bearded Ares

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to wash cars. Excellent at doing it. I even used it to blast moss of a wall and fence. What a difference the wall looks like it was just built
customer_reviews.author: Steps is great

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Cleaning driveways and path Also car very pleased and with delivery Got it early than expected brill
customer_reviews.author: robert simmons

customer_reviews.title: For the purchase price, it is as good as it gets.
customer_reviews.text: Most of all the weight of it, very easy to move about the garden.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Peter E Graham

customer_reviews.title: Power that’s easily manageable!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, just what I wanted! Easy to manage! Arrived on time! Would recommend using this company!
customer_reviews.author: lindacoope

customer_reviews.title: Price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for son to stop him borrowing mine. Its worked.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Dirty to clean in seconds
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing results wish I bought one when the patio was put down
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Newns

product_meta.title: XMSTORE Mole Repeller, Classic 2 Pack Solar Powered and Ultrasonic Gopher/Rodent/Vole Repeller
product_meta.description:
Size:2PCS(Square) 
Technical Parameters: 

Material: ABS 
Sound frequency: 400Hz-1,000Hz 
Effective coverage: 650 square meters 
Occasion: garden, ranch, airport, park

Features: 

- Use only ultrasonic sounds to repel and keep away the intruders. Motion sensor and ultrasonic wave technology would protect your garden or your home from damage.

Important Tips: 

- Install in the best sun location, so the solar panel can receive enough energy to work day and light. 
- Install the device towards the intruder's source for better results. 
- This product is IP56 waterproof, but must not be submerged in water. The unit should be installed 4 inches above the floor. If it is raining or flooding, take the repeller away until the rain subsides. 
- The effectiveness of the product depends on the type of soil. Wet clay is the best conductive sound medium. It is difficult to spread sound waves in dry, sandy, or peaty soils.

Packing list: 

2 * Ultrasonic Spikes
feature_bullets: 【Ultrasonic Mole Repeller】 Generate pulsation and ultrasound that stimulates the central nervous system of the moles. The emitted vibrations occur every 20 seconds with changing frequencies between 400Hz-1,000Hz.

【Environmentally friendly and durable】 Powered by solar energy, no need for additional batteries. The upgraded polycrystalline silicon solar module has higher photoelectric conversion efficiency and stability, and the photoelectric conversion efficiency will not decrease after long-term use.

【Wide effective working area】 Device works in a square pattern, about 15 m in radius and covers up to 650 square meters. To achieve the best possible result, we recommend installing 2 devices every 100 feet for floor surfaces.
【IP56 Waterproof and Corrosion Resistant】Ideal for outdoor areas such as gardens, shipyards, terraces, garages, driveways, farms, ponds but also attics.
【Guarantee】 We are fully responsible for the product. If you have any questions about the quality of our products, you can contact us at any time by email. We will respond within 24 hours.
